name: HURT 2: Lost in laboratory
description:
Imagine... you are waking up in an unknown place. A messed all kind of medical disposals are around you...

You have to collect weapons, and go ahead. You discover a gigantic lab, populated with zombies... you can shoot and have happyness by seeing all plethoras of zombies blowing with bombs and barrels full of fuel you can use to explode them !
But... step by step, in addition of zombies, many other creatures will be outrageous and more intelligent. You will be the target of all, and  other disgusting monsters which your mission is a real nightmare !
